channel.title: I have this problem since i downloaded my source
channel.description:
i have said this in my previous topics, and i found out that if i delete or mess up atuospawn.cfg and make npc's spawn any thing like hell. the server works fine without geting this error :
[code]Cannot find npcdrops.cfg Cannot find npc.cfg Cannot find autospawn.cfg[/code]
ok now some ppl will say that i miss the files but ur wrong i have them look
http://img79.imageshack.us/my.php?image=untitledym8.jpg
Please help me fix it, cause i have searched every where to change any thing in the runeserver.bat or in autospawn.

item.title: I have this problem since i downloaded my source
item.dc:creator: @tremendouse tremendouse
item.description:
@tremendouse wrote:

well i have to run it and close it “MANY” times, and that make the members in the server wait or even go to another server.

really i need help, this is a TESTSCAPE source based on cheez[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 03:18:59 PM[/size][hr]if u guys couldn’t help me in any way, please provide ur runserver.bat code.

tben, i have the same problem u have, but, i have to restart it MANY times like more then 20 times.

Read full topic
